channel.title: Projects on Ryan Baker
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Ryan Baker

item.title: Byte Courses
item.description: A lightweight learning management system built in Go for delivering structured programming courses.

item.title: Git Vista
item.description: A terminal tool for exploring Git repo history — commit analytics, file churn, and branch visualization without leaving the CLI.

item.title: Chroma Sudoku
item.description: Sudoku reimagined with colors instead of digits, running on an RP2350 with a 32×32 RGB LED matrix.

item.title: Sudoku Generator & Solver
item.description: A command-line Sudoku generator and solver in Go — built so I’d never need to buy another puzzle book.

item.title: Markee
item.description: A zero-dependency Markdown parser written from scratch in Go, focused on the subset of Markdown people actually use.

item.title: Model Registry
item.description: A system for cataloging and scoring Hugging Face models on domain-specific reliability, beyond star counts and downloads.

item.title: CPU Raytracer
item.description: A from-scratch C++ raytracer with reflection, refraction, and Monte Carlo path tracing — no graphics libraries.

item.title: Artscii
item.description: A C library for generating ASCII art from geometric primitives and images.

item.title: Onevim
item.description: A fast, opinionated Neovim configuration built for systems programming and staying out of your way.

item.title: NeoTeX
item.description: A Neovim plugin for live LaTeX preview — edit and see compiled output update without leaving your editor.

item.title: VimSlides
item.description: A Neovim plugin that turns Markdown files into terminal slideshows — no browser, no export step.

item.title: Convolution Visualizer
item.description: An interactive web tool for visualizing continuous-time signal convolution, step by step.

item.title: Passman
item.description: A local-first password manager in Python with SQLite storage and no cloud dependencies.

item.title: Big Nums
item.description: An arbitrary-precision integer and floating-point arithmetic library for C++, built from scratch.

item.title: Juicer
item.description: A high-performance chess move generator in C++, using magic bitboards for fast legal move enumeration.

item.title: 2048 Game
item.description: A Pygame recreation of the 2048 sliding tile puzzle.

item.title: C++ Chess Engine V1
item.description: My first chess engine — a from-scratch implementation in C++ with basic search and evaluation.

item.title: Python Chess Engine
item.description: My first chess engine — a simple implementation in Python that got me hooked on game programming.
